title: "why so salty in arurf"
body: Gee its almost as if im not having fun getting Q spammed by sivir every fucking game because all random is so great :D its great being beaten in lane every fucking game because oh i guess the enemy has caitlyn and ziggs, or maokai and fucking pantheon. Too bad its all random! thats why im salty, because it shouldnt be FUCKING random. I want to have fun in urf, not fucking despise it because the enemy got panethon or fucking vel koz. I wouldnt be as mad at riot if atleast URF was fucking fun, but no, even thats ruined now.

replies.body: What makes you think people aren't gonna pick these champs themselves in regular urf?

> [{quoted}](name=ﬂoo,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=c4G6P8yL,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2019-01-29T12:27:37.205+0000)
>
> What makes you think people aren't gonna pick these champs themselves in regular urf?

Than I can pick something that can actually lane against excessive poke.

Such as? Enemies pick heimer, nida, morg, rumble and idk.. smth ad or sona
Hf
Getting rid of the randomness will make it even less fun. People play even these fun modes just to win

> [{quoted}](name=ﬂoo,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=c4G6P8yL,comment-id=000300000000,timestamp=2019-01-29T14:49:13.895+0000)
>
> Such as? Enemies pick heimer, nida, morg, rumble and idk.. smth ad or sona
> Hf
> Getting rid of the randomness will make it even less fun. People play even these fun modes just to win

I can play Jayce, Zed, Mundo, Maokai, Garen, fiddlesticks, Kassadin, Xerath, Ziggs, Lux, Ahri, Syndra, Xin, Yi, Veigar, AP Lucian, AP Kai'sa, Ezreal, Wukong, etc. 

People spam strong champs in every game mode, URF isn't the exception.

So you went from playing a random mode to both sides picking what is necessary to win the game.
Kind of clashes with the "I wanna play what I want" argument, doesn't it? Unless you're one of those who just play to win. Otherwise you'll get stomped with your choice.

> [{quoted}](name=ﬂoo,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=c4G6P8yL,comment-id=00030000000000000000,timestamp=2019-01-29T19:28:00.512+0000)
>
> So you went from playing a random mode to both sides picking what is necessary to win the game.
> Kind of clashes with the "I wanna play what I want" argument, doesn't it? Unless you're one of those who just play to win. Otherwise you'll get stomped with your choice.

Or I like playing champs in URF that also happen to be good in it. I'm not playing Ezreal so I can be a try hard, I'm playing him because it's probably the most fun I've had playing LoL.
I played braum and rekt a jayce, who normally wins like everything because I could block his poke.  It can happen.
Isn't that the point of urf? To spam abilities? I mean I got pretty fed on Gnar in urf because our lane just kept on giving free kills but I'm not pissed that we ended up losing.

I am sure he means that some comps are insanely well thanks to the randomness and some are so fucking bad that you have to either dodge or suffer until you can surrender. Some champs really outshine other.

> [{quoted}](name=HopeStartsWithU,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=c4G6P8yL,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2019-01-29T12:13:54.216+0000)
>
> I am sure he means that some comps are insanely well thanks to the randomness and some are so fucking bad that you have to either dodge or suffer until you can surrender. Some champs really outshine other.

I believe that ''lucky champions'' in urf are just ones with lots of poke, shield, healing and CC.

{{champion:114}} {{champion:11}} {{champion:105}} {{champion:86}} 

Ahem.
I just like seeing ridiculous stuff in URF that can't happen in normal LoL even if I'm on the recieving end. I thought that was the fun of it.
the randomness actually has less toxic picks. i remember when urf wasnt random... zed and yi every game oh boy that was cool :D...
We had bans for a reason...

> [{quoted}](name=Jennifer420,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=c4G6P8yL,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2019-01-29T13:08:33.766+0000)
>
> the randomness actually has less toxic picks. i remember when urf wasnt random... zed and yi every game oh boy that was cool :D...

Even when it wasn't random, the matchups weren't usually that bad (even if they were sometimes ridiculous, both teams had roughly the same opportunities). But TBH **I'm fine with both AR- and original URF**.

People who write posts like OP usually show signs of taking the game too seriously *in general* (not just in URF).

Yeah, same here. I far prefer AR because if I wanted to pick a certain champ I would play normals but I see why people like normal URF as well. Maybe they should be looking to offer both types at the same time? I dunno I feel like they would have enough players to easily do it. 

All I know is even back to my original Dota days I preferred random or some option of it (specifically loved playing the mode where you choose between one int, agility or strength based champ). To me it shows a higher level of skill if you can win consistently in a random based mode compared to all pick.

All I remember is AD Malzahar ending games in 6-10 minutes.

Some games ended so early it didn't give IP because the game had to go on for at least 7 mins.
So don't play it.

> [{quoted}](name=dnsup,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=c4G6P8yL,comment-id=000c,timestamp=2019-01-29T17:34:02.138+0000)
>
> So don't play it.

http://prikachi.com/images/634/9493634d.jpg
It's weird. I didn't know they removed the option to... I don't know, don't fucking play a game mode you don't like?
URF was shitty even without the AR part. Onesided shitstomp fiesta, i don't like that
So in conclusion you simply don't know how to have fun if you're losing. Even in a *completely non-competitive* mode. Got it.

> [{quoted}](name=ExpStealer,realm=EUNE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=c4G6P8yL,comment-id=000a,timestamp=2019-01-29T17:25:42.934+0000)
>
> So in conclusion you simply don't know how to have fun if you're losing. Even in a *completely non-competitive* mode. Got it.

I mean how do u have fun when a yi 3 hits you and you can never hurt him since his q is always fucking up, or sivir just spams q or kayle has he ult every 20 seconds. And it wouldn’t be so bad if they only showed up every couple couple of games but no some how with over 100 champs in the game I still see these fucking prick of a champs almost every game

> [{quoted}](name=LAKIGR,realm=OCE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=c4G6P8yL,comment-id=000a0000,timestamp=2019-01-29T18:13:59.690+0000)
>
> I mean how do u have fun when a yi 3 hits you and you can never hurt him since his q is always fucking up, or sivir just spams q or kayle has he ult every 20 seconds. And it wouldn’t be so bad if they only showed up every couple couple of games but no some how with over 100 champs in the game I still see these fucking prick of a champs almost every game

Easily. By not giving a damn. That's how.

*plays URF mode*

**complains about abilities being spammed**

*plays AR urf mode*

**complains about unfair match ups**

LMAO!
"Booo I wanna pick the op urf champions booo"

> [{quoted}](name=Hügö,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=c4G6P8yL,comment-id=000b,timestamp=2019-01-29T17:26:23.046+0000)
>
> "Booo I wanna pick the op urf champions booo"

I was literally going to post this.

I just picked random in regular urf anyway.  You can only play the op things so many times before you want something spicy.
You would cry about the exact same thing if it was normal urf
AP Malph is disgusting in ARURF, not gonna lie
He was in old URF as well, what's your point?
you realize its even worse in todays damage meta, like to see you deal with him literally 1 shotting squishies

I just played a game where everyone else thought it was a life or death ranked game... playing safe, actually had a jungler, not spamming abilities, trying to run from fights.... here i am going 17/22 enjoying myself while everyone else is like 7/5.... im trying to get these people to actually realize the spawn timer is nothing and you get thousands of gold just standing around.... 

they keep farming while i keep diving onto towers and destroying people which is fun... it was so cringeworthy watching these people.  I guess eventually they got tired of me yelling at them to actually do something and stop running away so we won but.... last URF game i'm playing for a bit.

so yeah these people made me salty in urf... but probably not as bad as the other team who kept getting dove on over and over.
actual URF > this abomination of rigged urf(ARURF)
It should be random cuz there would be stupid meta and u would see only a few champions per game.

boycott it then



Also should urf skins be replaced with crappy ARurf skins.
If it wasnt random you'd get the same picks every game just like last time URF wasnt random.
